chart.title: Customer Authentications Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: index=oidemo sourcetype=radius start mdn="$sourcetypeToken$" | timechart count

chart.title: Customer Download History
chart.searchTemplate: index=oidemo (sourcetype=radius OR sourcetype=access_custom) | transaction maxspan=1m clientip mdn | search mdn="$sourcetypeToken$" bc_uri="/sync/addtolibrary/*" | top track_name

table.title: Error History
table.searchTemplate: index=oidemo (sourcetype=radius OR sourcetype=access_custom) | transaction maxspan=1m clientip mdn | search mdn="$sourcetypeToken$" bc_uri="/sync/addtolibrary/*" status=503 | table _time, mdn, status, artist_name, track_name, device_ip, useragent, bc_uri, track_id
